languages.text: "Я помогаю господину Тервантьясу! Я личный помощник, почти что... как это... секретарь. Я делаю... разное. Вчера я несколько часов искала одну штуку в комнатах под операционной — и зачем им там столько комнат и тупиков... А позавчера я настраивала одну из его машин — несколько раз было больно, но потом я разобралась..."

"I'm helping Master Tervantias! I'm his personal assistant, like... like a secretary! I do... things. Just yesterday, I spent several hours looking for something in the chambers under his operating theatre. So many rooms and dead-ends down there, I wonder why... The day before that, I was setting up one of his machines. It hurt me once or twice, but then I got the hang of it..."
languages.original_text: "Я помогаю господину Тервантьясу! Я личный помощник, почти что... как это... секретарь. Я делаю... разное. Вчера я несколько часов искала одну штуку в комнатах под операционной — и зачем им там столько комнат и тупиков... А позавчера я настраивала одну из его машин — несколько раз было больно, но потом я разобралась..."

languages.text: 「私はテルヴァンティアス様のお手伝いをしている！その…秘書のようなものだ。色んなことを…する。昨日は、手術室の下の部屋で数時間かけてあるものを探した。あそこはたくさん部屋があるうえに、なぜか行き止まりも多い…その前の日は、彼の機械をセットアップしていた。一度や二度は痛い思いをしたけど、そのうちコツをつかんだ…」
languages.original_text: "I'm helping Master Tervantias! I'm his personal assistant, like... like a secretary! I do... things. Just yesterday, I spent several hours looking for something in the chambers under his operating theatre. So many rooms and dead-ends down there, I wonder why... The day before that, I was setting up one of his machines. It hurt me once or twice, but then I got the hang of it..."

traits.locale_text: 「私はテルヴァンティアス様のお手伝いをしている！その…秘書のようなものだ。色んなことを…する。昨日は、手術室の下の部屋で数時間かけてあるものを探した。あそこはたくさん部屋があるうえに、なぜか行き止まりも多い…その前の日は、彼の機械をセットアップしていた。一度や二度は痛い思いをしたけど、そのうちコツをつかんだ…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我在协助特万提亚斯大师！我是他的私人助理，就像……就像秘书一样！我替他……做很多事情。就在昨天，我花了好几个小时，在他的手术室下方的房间里找东西。下面有那么多房间和死胡同，不知道他为什么要让我干这个……在那之前，我帮忙安装他的机器。那台机器弄伤了我一两次，但我很快就找到了诀窍……”
languages.original_text: "I'm helping Master Tervantias! I'm his personal assistant, like... like a secretary! I do... things. Just yesterday, I spent several hours looking for something in the chambers under his operating theatre. So many rooms and dead-ends down there, I wonder why... The day before that, I was setting up one of his machines. It hurt me once or twice, but then I got the hang of it..."

traits.locale_text: “我在协助特万提亚斯大师！我是他的私人助理，就像……就像秘书一样！我替他……做很多事情。就在昨天，我花了好几个小时，在他的手术室下方的房间里找东西。下面有那么多房间和死胡同，不知道他为什么要让我干这个……在那之前，我帮忙安装他的机器。那台机器弄伤了我一两次，但我很快就找到了诀窍……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡Estoy ayudando al amo Tervantias! Soy su asistente personal, como... ¡como una secretaria! Hago... cosas. Ayer mismo me pasé varias horas buscando algo en las cámaras bajo su sala de operaciones. Tantas habitaciones y callejones sin salida ahí abajo, me pregunto por qué... El día anterior, estuve montando una de sus máquinas. Me hice daño una o dos veces, pero luego le cogí el truco...».
languages.original_text: "I'm helping Master Tervantias! I'm his personal assistant, like... like a secretary! I do... things. Just yesterday, I spent several hours looking for something in the chambers under his operating theatre. So many rooms and dead-ends down there, I wonder why... The day before that, I was setting up one of his machines. It hurt me once or twice, but then I got the hang of it..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Estoy ayudando al amo Tervantias! Soy su asistente personal, como... ¡como una secretaria! Hago... cosas. Ayer mismo me pasé varias horas buscando algo en las cámaras bajo su sala de operaciones. Tantas habitaciones y callejones sin salida ahí abajo, me pregunto por qué... El día anterior, estuve montando una de sus máquinas. Me hice daño una o dos veces, pero luego le cogí el truco...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich helfe Meister Tervantias! Ich bin seine persönliche Assistentin, wie ... wie eine Sekretärin! Ich tue ... Dinge. Gerade gestern habe ich mehrere Stunden lang in den Kammern unter seinem Operationssaal nach etwas gesucht. So viele Räume und Sackgassen gibt es da unten, warum bloß ... Am Tag zuvor habe ich eine seiner Maschinen eingerichtet. Ein oder zwei Mal hat sie mich verletzt, aber dann hatte ich den Bogen raus ..."
languages.original_text: "I'm helping Master Tervantias! I'm his personal assistant, like... like a secretary! I do... things. Just yesterday, I spent several hours looking for something in the chambers under his operating theatre. So many rooms and dead-ends down there, I wonder why... The day before that, I was setting up one of his machines. It hurt me once or twice, but then I got the hang of it..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich helfe Meister Tervantias! Ich bin seine persönliche Assistentin, wie ... wie eine Sekretärin! Ich tue ... Dinge. Gerade gestern habe ich mehrere Stunden lang in den Kammern unter seinem Operationssaal nach etwas gesucht. So viele Räume und Sackgassen gibt es da unten, warum bloß ... Am Tag zuvor habe ich eine seiner Maschinen eingerichtet. Ein oder zwei Mal hat sie mich verletzt, aber dann hatte ich den Bogen raus ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis au service de maître Tervantias ! Je suis son assistante personnelle, comme... comme une secrétaire ! Je fais... différentes choses. Hier, par exemple, j'ai passé plusieurs heures à chercher quelque chose dans les salles sous sa salle d'opération. Il y avait tant de pièces et de culs-de-sac, là-dessous... Je me demande bien pourquoi... Bref, le jour d'avant, j'étais en train d'installer une de ses machines. Je me suis fait mal une ou deux fois, mais quand j'ai enfin compris comment faire... »
languages.original_text: "I'm helping Master Tervantias! I'm his personal assistant, like... like a secretary! I do... things. Just yesterday, I spent several hours looking for something in the chambers under his operating theatre. So many rooms and dead-ends down there, I wonder why... The day before that, I was setting up one of his machines. It hurt me once or twice, but then I got the hang of it..."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis au service de maître Tervantias ! Je suis son assistante personnelle, comme... comme une secrétaire ! Je fais... différentes choses. Hier, par exemple, j'ai passé plusieurs heures à chercher quelque chose dans les salles sous sa salle d'opération. Il y avait tant de pièces et de culs-de-sac, là-dessous... Je me demande bien pourquoi... Bref, le jour d'avant, j'étais en train d'installer une de ses machines. Je me suis fait mal une ou deux fois, mais quand j'ai enfin compris comment faire... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Üstat Tervantias'a yardım ediyorum! Kişisel asistanıyım, tıpkı... Tıpkı yazmanı gibi! Bana birtakım... İşler veriyor. Daha dün saatlerce ameliyathanenin altındaki odalarda bir şeyler aradım. Çok fazla oda ve çıkmaz koridor var, acaba neden?.. Geçen gün de makinelerinden birinin kurulumunu yaptım. Bir iki kez canımı acıttı ama sonra çözmeyi başardım..."
languages.original_text: "I'm helping Master Tervantias! I'm his personal assistant, like... like a secretary! I do... things. Just yesterday, I spent several hours looking for something in the chambers under his operating theatre. So many rooms and dead-ends down there, I wonder why... The day before that, I was setting up one of his machines. It hurt me once or twice, but then I got the hang of it..."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Tervantias'a yardım ediyorum! Kişisel asistanıyım, tıpkı... Tıpkı yazmanı gibi! Bana bazı... İşler veriyor. Daha dün saatlerce ameliyathanenin altındaki odalarda bir şeyler aradım. Oralarda çok fazla oda ve çıkmaz koridor var, acaba neden... Geçen gün de makinelerinden birinin kurulumunu yapıyordum. Bir iki kez canımı acıttı ama sonra çözmeyi başardım..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
